channel.title: Welcome to Hoottopic on Hoottopic
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Hoottopic on Hoottopic

item.title: Top 5 American Sodas During the 1800s
item.description: Before Coca-Cola became king, the 1800s were bubbling with strange brews, herbal tonics, and fizzy elixirs. Let’s pop the cork on the top 5 sodas that quenched America’s thirst in the 19th century.

item.title: Top 5 Poisonous Mushrooms
item.description: Nature hides danger in plain sight — especially among mushrooms. Here are the top 5 most poisonous mushrooms in the world

item.title: Top 5 Trees for Syrup
item.description: Not just maple! Several tree species produce delicious, tap-worthy sap. Here are the top 5 trees you can use to make syrup.

item.title: Top 5 Largest Whales
item.description: The oceans are home to some of the most massive creatures to ever exist. Here are the top 5 largest whales on Earth.

item.title: Top 5 Largest Snakes
item.description: Slithering giants roam the wild — some longer than a bus! Here are the top 5 largest snakes on Earth.
